markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Architect's Pattern Book](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2171)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Grimoire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=387" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 110 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Items which can be used once per week, may be used once per scenario or adventure in Pathfinder Society play._

**Price** 240 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Typically created by [wizards](/Classes.aspx?ID=12) who are hobbyists or professional architects, an _architect's pattern book_ allows the caster  to customize certain spells that create magical structures or domiciles, adding recreational areas such as an indoor bathhouse, gaming room, swimming pool, or similar luxury.

<document level="2" id="action-1667" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Architect's Pattern Book
